title: New: biLLLy – Locked In
body:
Londoner **biLLLy** has been around for a few years now, and has begun to garner quite a decent online following for his eccentric, slightly off-kilter disco-inspired pop.

His latest offering, _Locked In_, is another slice of perfectly composed pop, clocking in at three minutes exactly – there’s elements of the likes of Lil Silva and Jai Paul in it’s upbeat groove. Check it out below.
